name: Snallygaster
description: The Snallygaster possesses a robust physique with slimy tentacles and sharp talons, characterized by its ability to fly and unleash devastating screeches.
memorable: Its unique ability to regenerate hit points and reflect spells makes it a challenging opponent.
goals: To dominate its environment and thrive in battle using brute force and magical defenses.
relations: Can be found in the company of other aberrant creatures or lurking in dark, secluded places.
environment: Usually found in dark and mystical environments, where it can leverage its magic resistance and regeneration.
strengths: Impressive physical strength, high hit points, magical resistance, and regeneration ability.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and dexterity, making its movement patterns somewhat predictable.
attacks: Attacks include dangerous Slimy Tentacles that inflict ongoing acid damage and sharp Talons for piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: The Screech ability can deal substantial thunder damage and potentially stun multiple foes.
senses: Possesses darkvision which allows it to see in dim light as if it were bright light.
skills: Has a moderate passive perception score of 12.
additional_information: Immune to acid and thunder damage.
Multiattack allows it to strike multiple times in one turn.
Ability to regain hit points at the start of its turn.
Can reflect spells cast against it.
test_queries: slimy tentacle monster with thunder abilities
fearsome creature that can stun its foes
acid and thunder immune monster in dark environments
